sentences.english: HPLC method for the determination of stachydrine hydrochloride in Yimucao tablets was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了HPLC法測定益母草片中鹽酸水蘇鹼的含量。

sentences.english: Objective To find the suitable seeding time of herba leonuri.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索益母草合適的播種期。

sentences.english: Leonurus herbal regulates menstruation and arrest leucorrhoea.
Results Fingerprints of Leonurus heterophyllus Injection obtained contained 12 major common peaks.
sentences.chinese: 結果標示出益母草注射液中12個主要共有峯。

sentences.english: Observation of number of chromosomes in Leonurus japonicus and Xanthium sibiricum.
sentences.chinese: 益母草和蒼耳染色體數目的觀察。

sentences.english: Motherwort powder and honey are joined inside cucumber juice right amount, smooth.
sentences.chinese: 在黃瓜汁內加入益母草粉末和蜂蜜適量，調勻。

definition: four-substance decoction (si wu tang), tonic formula used in Chinese medicine
huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
grains of Job's tears plant 薏苡[yi4 yi3]
peach kernel, used in Chinese medicine
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
